email.verify_subtitle: Just one more step to get started!
email.verify_message: Thank you for registering with {siteName}! To complete your account setup and start enjoying all our features, please verify your email address by clicking the button below.
email.verify_section_desc: Click the button below to verify your email address and activate your account. This ensures the security of your account and helps us keep you updated.
email.verify_alternative: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.verify_warning_text: This verification link will expire in 24 hours. If you didn't create an account with us, please ignore this email. Your email address will not be added to our system.
email.verify_automated: This is an automated verification email. Please do not reply.
email.reset_message: We received a request to reset your password for your {siteName} account. Don't worry - this happens to the best of us! Click the button below to create a new password:
reset_security_items: This link will expire in 1 hour for your security
If you didn't request this reset, you can safely ignore this email
Your password remains unchanged until you complete the reset process
Never share this link with anyone else
email.reset_automated: This is an automated security email. Please do not reply.

cronjobs.daily_cleanup_purpose: Removes expired tokens, old logs, and optimizes database
cronjobs.daily_cleanup_task_2: Cleans up old email logs (90+ days)
cronjobs.daily_cleanup_task_4: Cleans up old search queries (keeps top 1000)
cronjobs.weekly_maintenance_purpose: Optimizes database tables and clears cache
cronjobs.thumbnail_grid_purpose: Generates social media thumbnail grid for homepage
cronjobs.thumbnail_grid_task_1: Creates grid of popular game thumbnails
cronjobs.thumbnail_grid_task_3: Updates only when needed (7+ days old)
cronjobs.setup_step_1: Enable Cron Jobs: Go to System Settings and enable cron jobs with a secure password
cronjobs.setup_step_2: Replace URLs: Change "yoursite.com" to your actual domain in the commands above
cronjobs.setup_step_3: Set Password: Replace "YOUR_CRON_PASSWORD" with your actual cron password
cronjobs.setup_step_4: Add to Crontab: Add the commands to your server's crontab or use a service like GitHub Actions
cronjobs.setup_step_5: Monitor Logs: Check the cron logs in your admin dashboard for execution status

cronjobs.setup_step_1: 1. Add the cron commands to your server's crontab
